text: vacana ehi (niyamita) sthanayen venas karana, emenma api savan dunimu, api pitupævemu, æhumkan dimakin torava numba savan denu yæyi dahamehi adu padu ætikaramin vacana venas karamin "raina" yæyi pavasannan yudevvan aturin veti. ovun api savan dunimu, avanata vuyemu, savan denu "unlurna" (apa veta savadhanaya yomu karanu.) yæyi pavasa sitiye nam eya ovunata yahapatak vannata tibuni. tavada vadat niværædi vannata da tibuni. enamut ovunge pratiksepaya hetuven allah ovunata sapa kaleya. eheyin svalpa denaku misa ovuhu visvasa nokarati
